data.oai_dc:dc: Data were obtained from Herben et al. (2012), which used information from LEDA (Kleyer et al., 2008), CLO-PLA3 (Klimešová et al., 2017) and Herben et al. (2017).
alternative design|boosted regression tree (BRT)|elasticity|fitness|functional trait|population growth rate|trade-off|vegetative reproduction
